name: Numehex
description:
Our submission for the game jam. A classic overhead Sunsoft style game, like Fester's Quest or Master Blaster.

IMPORTANT: This game is a bit of an unfinished mess and buggy, but please give it a whirl, the artist did an amazing job. In terms of NES-ness of the end result, I suspect we have far too many pallettes active at once. Though, the only things we choose to purposesly ignore were any semblance memory restraint, even with this short level, I suspect we already have far more sprites than many of the late stage NES cartridges.

Credits:

Artist : Mr. Delgado

Programmer/Music (with apologies for both) : Superflounder

Sound FX : SomeGuy22 https://freesound.org/people/SomeGuy22/

Font : Pav Creations https://pavcreations.com/

Font :  Aenigma Fonts https://www.1001fonts.com/users/kentpw/
